DIA_Salvi_Q205_RENEGADECATCH_03_01: Well, well. Who do we have here?
DIA_Salvi_Q205_RENEGADECATCH_03_02: Had the dog ventured too far from his kennel?
DIA_Salvi_Q205_RENEGADECATCH_03_03: Your master isn't here. There is only a pack of hungry wolves.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_RENEGADECATCH_Join_15_01: What if I... become one of you?
DIA_Salvi_Q205_RENEGADECATCH_Join_03_02: One of us, huh? With a knife at your throat, anyone would say that.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_RENEGADECATCH_Join_03_03: On the other hand, you were the only one of Roderich's men to track us. We could use a scout like you.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_RENEGADECATCH_Join_03_04: I'm an understanding guy. I was hesitant at one time too, but I made a decision that I don't regret now.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_RENEGADECATCH_Join_03_05: You can count on my mercy, but I want to make sure you're on our side.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_RENEGADECATCH_NoLaw_15_01: So you dream of a lawless country?
DIA_Salvi_Q205_RENEGADECATCH_NoLaw_03_02: If Roderich hasn't been able to maintain order, he won't be able to maintain it after we're gone.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_RENEGADECATCH_NoLaw_03_03: War, rebellions by Southerners and bandit raids are too much for these weaklings.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_RENEGADECATCH_NoLaw_03_04: I, on the other hand, am not going to wait any longer for the best morsels to pass right under my nose.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_RENEGADECATCH_RoderichFin: Take a look around. You're hiding in the woods like rats, and just a few days ago you could have had it all.
Sooner or later Roderich will find you.
Correction, you little snot. Now we've got everything, and before that we were just that damn lackeys.
He may find us, but he can't wipe us out. We have weapons, armor and... good friends. We grow stronger every day.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_RENEGADECATCH_Mistake_15_: It's not too late for you to correct your mistake.
Return to the barracks and answer for your misdeeds, and Roderich will show you mercy.
At worst, you'll end up in the Valley of Mines.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_RENEGADECATCH_Mistake_03_: Hahahaha! If you believe that, you must really be stupid. The dungeons are overcrowded and ships from Khorinis run every few months.
If I went back, I and my men would be facing a noose and a flock of hungry crows.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_RENEGADECATCH_WhatDo_15_0: What would I have to do?
DIA_Salvi_Q205_RENEGADECATCH_Work_03_01: We had a nice chat, but there's work to be done.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_RENEGADECATCH_Work_03_04: You discovered our hideout. I like to take risks, but everything has its limits.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_RENEGADECATCH_03_05: Hasn't the old man taught you yet that it's not nice to lie to someone's face?
DIA_Salvi_Q205_RENEGADECATCH_03_06: Did you think if you came in here without a uniform, I'd be so easily fooled?
DIA_Salvi_Q205_RENEGADECATCH_03_07: My men have seen you in the barracks and on the Roderich's carpet.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_RENEGADECATCH_03_09: My name is Salvi and I am the leader of this unit.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_RENEGADECATCH_Rookie_03_0: I take it you're the brave rookie who was supposed to bring us home politely?
I'm going to disappoint you, but we have no intention of going back to stinky bunks, eating the same stale food and fulfilling the commander's whims.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_RENEGADECATCH_Rookie_15_0: Is that what this little rebellion of yours is all about? To make your lives more comfortable?
DIA_Salvi_Q205_RENEGADECATCH_Rookie_03_0: Here we can do whatever we want.
Whatever we do, rob a merchant or raid a shipment of silver, Roderich and his wonderful city guard will still be responsible for everything.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_RENEGADECATCH_DanielInCor: See that boy in the corner? That's Daniel. The last man loyal to Gerwin.
The kid doesn't realize the seriousness of the situation or he's just an idiot.
Either way, he delays our actions, and no one is going to drag him with us.
I want you to kill him.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_RENEGADECATCH_Untied_15_0: How am I supposed to kill him with my hands tied?
DIA_Salvi_Q205_RENEGADECATCH_Untied_03_0: Do what you have to do and you will become one of us.
Just don't try any tricks. Me and my people are keeping an eye on you.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_RENEGADECATCH_DontKill_15: You don't have to kill him.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_RENEGADECATCH_DontKill_03: Well, I have to. The snot has no value to me and is just a burden.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_RENEGADECATCH_DontKill_15: You gave me a chance. Why don't you give it to Daniel? Maybe I can convince him to give in?
DIA_Salvi_Q205_RENEGADECATCH_DontKill_03: You have one try. No more. It's better for you if he says yes.
One freeloader on the team is a lot, and two is far too many.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_RENEGADECATCH_NotMurderer: You want me to kill a defenseless boy? Not gonna happen.
I knew you were weak. You all are.
Looks like I'll kill him myself, but only after I'm done with you.
Meet Luise. It's been a long time since she's had some decent entertainment, but that's about to change.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_Daniel_Alright_03_02: I'll believe it when I see it.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_Daniel_Alright_03_03: Do what you have to do and you will become one of us.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_Daniel_Alright_03_04: Just don't try any tricks. Me and my people are keeping an eye on you.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_DanielResult_03_01: Well, well, who would have guessed? What a brute you are!
DIA_Salvi_Q205_DanielResult_03_02: I see the brat is biting the dust. You did a good job.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_DanielResult_15_03: I did what you wanted me to do. Am I one of you now?
DIA_Salvi_Q205_DanielResult_03_04: You've shown that you don't give a shit about Roderich's orders, and you followed mine, as you should. I really like that.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_DanielResult_03_05: Yes, you are one of us.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_DanielResult_03_06: I see the bastard's alive. I take it he's on our side now?
DIA_Salvi_Q205_DanielResult_15_07: I talked some sense into him.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_DanielResult_03_08: We'll see if you're telling the truth.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_DanielResult_15_09: Am I one of you now?
DIA_Salvi_Q205_DanielResult_03_10: You didn't quite do what I wanted, but you showed thoughtfulness, and that's appreciated.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_DanielResult_03_11: Looks like my Luise will have to wait a bit.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_DanielResult_03_12: Let's just say you're one of us, but soon you'll have another opportunity to prove your loyalty.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_DanielResult_03_13: Like I said, the boy's a little stubborn.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_DanielResult_03_15: You tried, but you should have listened to me. You won't get another chance.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_DanielResult_03_16: Meet Luise. It's been a long time since she's had some decent entertainment, but that's about to change.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_DanielResult_03_17: Stand still. It'll all be over soon.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_DanielResult_Stuff_15_03: I just wanted to know where you keep it.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_DanielResult_Stuff_03_04: I can assure you that it is safe with us.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_DanielResult_Stuff_03_05: Make yourself at home. We're gonna be here for a while.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_DanielResult_Stuff_03_06: Oh, and one more thing - nobody moves from here until I say we move. You got that?
DIA_Salvi_Q205_DanielResult_Stuff_03_08: I'm glad. Understanding is the basis of successful cooperation.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_DanielResult_Stuff_03_09: I just hope I didn't make an idiot of myself by trusting you, snot.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_Questions_15_01: I have a few questions for you.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_Questions_03_02: Just be quick, because I've got my hands full.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_Questions_Action_15_01: When do we get out of here?
DIA_Salvi_Q205_Questions_Action_03_03: At this point, your only concern is sitting on your ass and waiting.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_Questions_Action_03_04: And if you're bored as hell, I have the perfect game for you. It's called 'spit and catch'.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_Questions_Plan_03_02: You think I'm just gonna let you in on the next operation?
DIA_Salvi_Q205_Questions_Plan_03_03: Wait patiently until I give the order to march. Then you'll know what I'm planning.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_Questions_Leave_15_01: Why don't you let people leave this place?
DIA_Salvi_Q205_Questions_Leave_03_02: Correction, I'm not letting YOU leave this place.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_Questions_Leave_03_03: Admittedly, you did what I expected of you, but you're new here, and newbies have to earn my respect and that of my people.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_Questions_Leave_03_04: If I see that you're loyal, who knows, maybe in time I'll even let you piss outside.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_RENEGADECATCH_Gerwin_15_0: I'm looking for the sergeant sent to Silbach.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_RENEGADECATCH_Gerwin_03_0: Congratulations, your mission was a success
DIA_Salvi_Q205_RENEGADECATCH_Gerwin_15_0: I thought Gerwin was the leader.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_RENEGADECATCH_Gerwin_03_0: He used to be. He also used to be more talkative.
He's taking a bath and doesn't seem to be in any hurry to get to shore.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_RENEGADECATCH_Roderich_15: Roderich sent me. I was to find Gerwin's unit and find out why it hasn't reported to him in days.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_RENEGADECATCH_Lost_15_01: I'm sorry, but... I seem to have lost my way.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_RENEGADECATCH_Lost_03_02: I think you're lying to me or mocking me. As it happens, I don't like liars and jokers.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_RENEGADECATCH_Fight_15_01: I have a suggestion. Let's settle this between us. You and me. The winner walks out of here in one piece.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_RENEGADECATCH_Fight_03_02: Not a bad offer. You're a man of honor. That's what's valued.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_RENEGADECATCH_Fight_03_03: Sorry, boy, but I'm not him.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_RENEGADECATCH_WhatDo_03_0: You will have to shorten the suffering of one of the birds, which stubbornly does not want to fly out of its nest.
I want to introduce you to someone. Follow me.
DIA_Salvi_Q205_RENEGADECATCH_Mistake_Wor: Then why don't you untie me?
DIA_Salvi_Q205_RENEGADECATCH_Lost_Choice: I think I lost my way.
